Notes: VAT，State/local sales tax varies by jurisdiction (~0%–10%+).
Some provinces use HST 13–15%; others GST 5% + PST/QST.
SST (Sales 5%/10%, Services 8%)，Not a VAT system; rates vary by goods/services.
VAT 12%，Standard rate; exemptions/zero-rating for specific cases.
VAT 7%, Temporarily reduced rate; periodically renewed.
GST 18%, other slabs like 5% apply to some goods.
Consumption Tax 10%,Reduced 8% for food and some items.
Typical ICMS 17–20% + IPI/PIS/COFINS; reform to CBS/IBS in transition.
